availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hanna Olevia Goble Rice (Carter County resident (composite bio))

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, housekeeper. Carter County, Kentucky, native. Daughter of Stephen M. Goble and Emily Goble. Married to Hiram A. Rice in Carter County on February 11, 1846. Mother of Eliza Ellen Rice, Matilda Rice, Elizabeth “Lizzie” Rice, and Thomas F. Rice. Student in Carter County in 1850. Housekeeper in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 214A.

Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 499D..

Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Carter County Marriages, p. 7 of microfilm.
